byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and NATE SCHWEBER
byline.contributor: Stephanie Clifford, Joseph Goldstein and Noah Remnick contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The attack, in which the police said five men with a gun separated a father from his daughter and then took turns raping the 18-year-old woman, set off waves of anger and uncertainty in Brownsville.

headline.print_headline: 4 Suspects in Custody After Brazen Brooklyn Rape
headline.main: 4 Suspects in Brooklyn Rape Are in Custody

snippet: The attack, in which the police said five men with a gun separated a father from his daughter and then took turns raping the 18-year-old woman, set off waves of anger and uncertainty in Brownsville.
abstract: New York City police announce arrest of four teenagers suspected of gang-raping 18-year-old woman in playground in Brownsville neighborhood of Brooklyn; two of teenagers were turned in by their parents after police released surveillance video of young men entering deli before rape.
